element.name: Crown of Cogs and Gears
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: While wearing this crown, you can use an action to cast the command spell from it at will, but the spell can only target Construct type creatures.

element.name: The Mask of Many Faces
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: While wearing this white, ceramic mask, you can use an action to steal the face of creature that has one, permanently removing it from them, making them appear as if there was only a blur on their face, even though they can still talk, eat, etc. If you have at least one face in the mask, you can cast the Disguise Self spell with it at will, to look like the creature whose face you stole as you remember them.

element.name: Helmet of Debilitation
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: While attuned to this helmet, your immobilizing capabilities are enhanced. While you are restricting the movement or actions of a creature, damage rolls made against them from melee and ranged attacks deal maximum damage until the end of your next turn. A creature can only be weakened once per day this way.

element.name: Gas Mask
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: This bulky mask is made of a face-shaped sheet of metal, two large circular glass lenses, and two tubes with filters inside. It seals perfectly, any gas entering is purified and becomes breathable.
While wearing the mask you cannot be poisoned by airborne poisons, spores and the like, but you automatically fail Wisdom (Perception) checks that require smelling.
